Validation Errors:
Halfling-Craven Alternatives: Craven may not be combined with Fearless, Practicality, Wanderlust, Halfling Luck, or Underfoot (Halfling)
Halfling-Outrider Alternatives: Outrider may not be combined with Sure-Footed, Practicality, Swift As Shadows, or Warslinger
Halfling-Practicality Alternatives: Practicality may not be combined with Fearless, Craven, Wanderlust, Sure-Footed, Outrider, Swift As Shadows, or Warslinger
Halfling-Swift As Shadows Alternatives: Swift As Shadows may not be combined with Sure-Footed, Outrider, Practicality, or Warslinger
Halfling-Underfoot (Halfling) Alternatives: Underfoot (Halfling) may not be combined with Halfling Luck, Craven, or Wanderlust
Halfling-Wanderlust Alternatives: Wanderlust may not be combined with Fearless, Craven, Practicality, Halfling Luck, or Underfoot (Halfling)
Halfling-Warslinger Alternatives: Warslinger may not be combined with Sure-Footed, Outrider, Practicality, or Swift As Shadows
